attributes.action: people caught using a mobile phone in a car should have 2 points on their license
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel the government is to layedback when it comes to mobile phones being used at the wheel of a on going car, all we do is give them a measely fine and a slap on the hand, so they feel the risk is worth taking. i think if the government takes note of my petition then we can make drivers get points on there license. i am doing this petitions because i had a close friend killed when she was on the phone, and she wasnt concentrating therefore ending up crashing.

rejection.details: Please rephrase your title so it is a clear call for action (i.e. starts with a verb).
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
